com.myronmarston.music.notation
Class NotationNote

java.lang.Object
  com.myronmarston.music.notation.AbstractNotationElement
      com.myronmarston.music.notation.NotationNote
All Implemented Interfaces:
NotationElement
public class NotationNote
extends AbstractNotationElement

Represents one note of music notation.

Constructor Detail

NotationNote

public NotationNote(PartSection partSection,
                    char letterName,
                    int octave,
                    int accidental,
                    Fraction duration,
                    Fraction timeLeftInBar,
                    int volume,
                    boolean isFirstNoteInGermCopy)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Constructor.

Parameters:
partSection - the partSection that owns this notation note
letterName - the letter name for this notation note (a-g)
octave - the octave for this notation note
accidental - the accidental for this notation note; positive indicates a number of sharps and negative indicates a number of flats
duration - the rhythmic duration of this notation note
timeLeftInBar - the amount of time left in the current bar
volume - the raw midi volume of the note
isFirstNoteInGermCopy - whether or not this is the first note in a copy of the germ
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the accidental outside of the range -2 to 2, the letterName is invalid, the duration is negative, or the volume is not in the allowed range
Method Detail

createRest

public static NotationNote createRest(PartSection partSection,
                                      Fraction duration,
                                      Fraction timeLeftInBar,
                                      boolean isFirstNoteInGermCopy)
Creates a rest.

Parameters:
partSection - the partSection that will own the rest
duration - the duration of the rest
timeLeftInBar - the amount of time left in the bar
isFirstNoteInGermCopy - whether or not this is the first note in a series of notes that makes a germ copy
Returns:
the rest

getTimeLeftInBar

public Fraction getTimeLeftInBar()
Gets the amount of time left in this bar. This is needed to be able to split a long rest across a bar lines.

Returns:
the amount of time tha this is left in the bar

getDynamic

public NotationDynamic getDynamic()
Gets the notation dynamic for this notation note. If none has been set, the default empty dynamic will be returned.

Returns:
the dynamic

Checks to see if this notation note is a rest.

applyTupletMultiplier

public NotationNote applyTupletMultiplier(Fraction multiplier)
                                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Creates a new notation note with a duration that is scaled by the given multiplier, which can be used when grouping tuplets.

Parameters:
multiplier - the tuplet multiplier
Returns:
a new notation note
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the multiplier is note positive

getNotationStaffNoteNumber

public int getNotationStaffNoteNumber()
                               throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
Gets a number indicating the line or space on the staff used by this notation note. C0 is 0, and each successive letter is one more.

Returns:
the notation staff note number
Throws:
java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if this note is a rest
